list.label: Host
list.name: host
list.query: show tag values from "cacheinstance-total-memory-utilization" with key="host"

list.label: Message VPN
list.name: mvpn
list.query: show tag values from "cacheinstance-total-memory-utilization" with key="mvpn" where host='$host'

list.label: SolCache Instance
list.name: cacheinstance
list.query: show tag values from "cacheinstance-total-memory-utilization" with key="cacheinstance" where host='$host' and mvpn='$mvpn'
